{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=DG834G |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/15/2004 |manuf_country= |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=PY3DG834GV2 |ic_id=4054A-DG834GV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7301 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ABTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16800A-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''54 Mbps Wireless ADSL Firewall Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=DG834Gv2|vs_id=2324}} CPU is part TNETD7301GDU. [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netgear_DG834_(series) DG834 series on Wikipedia]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/dg834.g/b On the OpenWrt wiki] [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HxQsuzKMFFw '''Netgear DG834G Wi-Fi ADSL Modem Router Disassembled''' on YouTube] (TQ) :"4900"... appears to be silkscreened on the board under the wireless module. '''SerComm''' is the presumed OEM. Per the manual, the default SSID is '''NETGEAR'''.
